name: Jump The Car
description:
Discover a new kind of ramp jumping in a car! Go down the ramp and jump as far as you can… This time in 2D!

Features:
- Easy to pick up and play
- Addictive high-score-based gameplay
- Multiple varied environments
- Awesome car to drive… and crash!

This is ramp car jumping distilled into its most basic form. See how far you can jump in one of multiple varied environments! Pick your car, fly, and… Finish off your approach with a mighty crash!

The game features multiple cars to choose from and a skill-based gameplay that will keep you coming back for more. Try to beat your high score and fly further than anyone before!
